WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SARDINIA.
DNC 08.
VESSEL, FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
IN 38-41.00N 008-34.00E AT 072000Z NOV.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409, 390 6592 4145,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
